name: Night Stop
description:
Your car broke down in the middle of a strange, deserted road. You walked in the dark highway until you found a weird restaurant....

My first game-thingy. Now really, it's not much of anything, I just wanted to test some stuff. It's a visual novel but has some point-and-click elements. Choices only change a few lines of dialogue.  Should be something around five to ten minutes to play.
